item.title: Integrating RH-SSO (Keycloak) to ADFS
item.description: This article aims to present the steps required to create the minimum necessary infrastructure, to gain familiarity with, and test Red Hat Single Sign-On (SSO) and its integration with Microsoft Active Federation Services (ADFS) via the SAML protocol. Most businesses usually have a large Windows estate and therefore use Active Directory (AD) as it provides a single source of user management in the organisation. Many organizations often incorporate additional authentication programs and protocols in tandem with AD, including RH-SSO for example.
